verses.verse: There is therefore <WG686> now <WG3568> no <WG3762> condemnation <WG2631> to those who are <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> who don't <WG3361> walk <WG4043> according <WG2596> to the flesh, <WG4561> but <WG235> according <WG2596> to the Spirit. <WG4151>

For <WG1063> the law <WG3551> of the Spirit <WG4151> of life <WG2222> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> made <WG1659> me <WG3165> free <WG1659> from <WG575> the law <WG3551> of sin <WG266> and <WG2532> of death. <WG2288>

For <WG1063> what <WG3588> the law <WG3551> couldn't <WG102> do, in <WG1722> that <WG3739> it was weak <WG770> through <WG1223> the flesh, <WG4561> God <WG2316> did, <WG3992> sending his own <WG1438> Son <WG5207> in <WG1722> the likeness <WG3667> of sinful <WG266> flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> for <WG4012> sin, <WG266> he condemned <WG2632> sin <WG266> in <WG1722> the flesh; <WG4561>

that <WG2443> the ordinance <WG1345> of the law <WG3551> might be fulfilled <WG4137> in <WG1722> us, <WG2254> who walk <WG4043> not <WG3361> after <WG2596> the flesh, <WG4561> but <WG235> after <WG2596> the Spirit. <WG4151>

For <WG1063> those who live <WG5607> according <WG2596> to the flesh <WG4561> set their minds <WG5426> on the things <WG3588> of the flesh, <WG4561> but <WG1161> those who live according <WG2596> to the Spirit, <WG4151> the things <WG3588> of the Spirit. <WG4151>
For <WG1063> the <WG5427> mind <WG5427> of the flesh <WG4561> is death, <WG2288> but <WG1161> the <WG5427> mind <WG5427> of the Spirit <WG4151> is life <WG2222> and <WG2532> peace; <WG1515>

because <WG1360> the mind <WG5427> of the flesh <WG4561> is hostile <WG2189> towards <WG1519> God; <WG2316> for <WG1063> it is <WG5293> not <WG3756> subject <WG5293> to God <WG2316>'s law, <WG3551> neither <WG3761> indeed <WG1063> can it be. <WG1410>
<WG1161> Those who are <WG5607> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> can't <WG1410> please <WG700> God. <WG2316>

But <WG1161> you <WG5210> are <WG2075> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> but <WG235> in <WG1722> the Spirit, <WG4151> if it is so that <WG1512> the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316> dwells <WG3611> in <WG1722> you. <WG5213> But <WG1161> if <WG1487> any man <WG5100> doesn't <WG3756> have <WG2192> the Spirit <WG4151> of Christ, <WG5547> he <WG3778> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> his. <WG846>

<WG1161> If <WG1487> Christ <WG5547> is in <WG1722> you, <WG5213> the body <WG4983> is dead <WG3498> because of <WG1223> sin, <WG266> but <WG1161> the spirit <WG4151> is alive <WG2222> because of <WG1223> righteousness. <WG1343>

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> the Spirit <WG4151> of him who raised up <WG1453> Jesus <WG2424> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> dwells <WG3611> in <WG1722> you, <WG5213> he who raised up <WG1453> Christ <WG5547> Jesus from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> will <WG2227> also <WG2532> give life <WG2227> to your <WG5216> mortal <WG2349> bodies <WG4983> through <WG1223> his <WG846> Spirit <WG4151> who dwells <WG1774> in <WG1722> you. <WG5213>
So <WG3767> then, <WG80> brothers, we are <WG2070> debtors, <WG3781> not <WG3756> to the flesh, <WG4561> to live <WG2198> after <WG2596> the flesh. <WG4561>

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> you live <WG2198> after <WG2596> the flesh, <WG4561> you must <WG3195> die; <WG599> but <WG1161> if <WG1487> by the Spirit <WG4151> you <WG2289> put to death <WG2289> the deeds <WG4234> of the body, <WG4983> you will live. <WG2198>
For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> are led <WG71> by the Spirit <WG4151> of God, <WG2316> these <WG3778> are <WG1526> children <WG5207> of God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> you <WG2983> didn't <WG3756> receive <WG2983> the spirit <WG4151> of bondage <WG1397> again <WG3825> to <WG1519> fear, <WG5401> but <WG235> you received <WG2983> the Spirit <WG4151> of adoption, <WG1722> by <WG3739> whom we cry, <WG2896> "Abba! <WG5> Father! <WG3962>"
The Spirit <WG4151> himself <WG846> testifies with <WG4828> our <WG2257> spirit <WG4151> that <WG3754> we are <WG2070> children <WG5043> of God; <WG2316>

and <WG1161> if <WG1487> children, <WG5043> then <WG2532> heirs; <WG2818> heirs <WG2818> of God, <WG2316> and <WG1161> joint heirs <WG4789> with Christ; <WG5547> if indeed <WG1512> we suffer with <WG4841> him, <WG1512> that we may also <WG2532> be <WG4888> glorified with him. <WG4888>

For <WG1063> I consider <WG3049> that <WG3754> the sufferings <WG3804> of <WG2540> this present <WG3568> time <WG2540> are not <WG3756> worthy <WG514> to be compared with <WG4314> the glory <WG1391> which will <WG3195> be revealed <WG601> toward <WG1519> us. <WG2248>
For <WG1063> the creation <WG2937> waits with eager expectation <WG603> for <WG553> the children <WG5207> of God <WG2316> to be revealed. <WG602>

For <WG1063> the creation <WG2937> was subjected <WG5293> to vanity, <WG3153> not <WG3756> of <WG1223> its own will, <WG235> but because of <WG1223> him who subjected <WG5293> it, <WG1909> in hope <WG1680>

that <WG3754> the creation <WG2937> itself <WG846> also <WG2532> will be delivered <WG1659> from <WG575> the bondage <WG1397> of decay <WG5356> into <WG1519> the liberty <WG1657> of the glory <WG1391> of the children <WG5043> of God. <WG2316>
For <WG1063> we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the whole <WG3956> creation <WG2937> groans <WG4959> and <WG2532> travails in pain together <WG4944> until <WG891> now. <WG3568>

Not <WG3756> only <WG3440> so, <WG235> but ourselves <WG846> also, <WG2532> who have <WG2192> the first <WG536> fruits <WG536> of the Spirit, <WG4151> even <WG2532> we <WG2249> ourselves <WG846> groan <WG4727> within <WG1722> ourselves, <WG1438> waiting for <WG553> adoption, <WG5206> the redemption <WG629> of <WG4983> our <WG2257> body. <WG4983>

For <WG1063> we were saved <WG4982> in hope, <WG1680> but <WG1161> hope <WG1680> that is seen <WG991> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> hope. <WG1680> For <WG1063> <WG99999> who <WG1679> <WG2532> hopes for <WG1679> that which <WG3739> he <WG1679> sees? <WG991>
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> we hope for <WG1679> that <WG3739> which we don't <WG3756> see, <WG991> we <WG553> wait for <WG553> it with <WG1223> patience. <WG5281>

In the same <WG5615> way, <WG4151> the Spirit also <WG2532> helps <WG4878> our <WG2257> weaknesses, <WG769> for <WG1063> we don't <WG3756> know <WG1492> how <WG5101> to pray <WG4336> as <WG2526> we ought. <WG1163> But <WG235> the Spirit <WG4151> himself <WG846> makes intercession <WG5241> for <WG5228> us <WG2257> with groanings <WG4726> which can't <WG215> be uttered.

He <WG1161> who searches <WG2045> the hearts <WG2588> knows <WG1492> what <WG5101> is on the Spirit <WG4151>'s mind, <WG5427> because <WG3754> he makes intercession <WG1793> for <WG5228> the saints <WG40> according to <WG2596> God. <WG2316>

<WG1161> We know <WG1492> that <WG3754> all things <WG3956> work together <WG4903> for <WG1519> good <WG18> for those who love <WG25> God, <WG2316> to those who are <WG5607> called <WG2822> according to <WG2596> his purpose. <WG4286>

For <WG3754> whom <WG3739> he foreknew, <WG4267> he <WG4309> also <WG2532> predestined <WG4309> to be conformed to <WG4832> the image <WG1504> of <WG5207> his <WG846> Son, <WG5207> that <WG1519> he <WG846> might be <WG1511> the firstborn <WG4416> among <WG1722> many <WG4183> brothers. <WG80>

<WG1161> Whom <WG3739> he predestined, <WG4309> those <WG5128> he also <WG2532> called. <WG2564> <WG2532> Whom <WG3739> he called, <WG2564> those <WG5128> he <WG1344> also <WG2532> justified. <WG1344> <WG1161> Whom <WG3739> he justified, <WG1344> those <WG5128> he <WG1392> also <WG2532> glorified. <WG1392>

What <WG5101> then <WG3767> shall we <WG2046> say <WG2046> about <WG4314> these things? <WG5023> If <WG1487> God <WG2316> is for <WG5228> us, <WG2257> who <WG5101> can be against <WG2596> us? <WG2257>

He who <WG3739> didn't <WG3756> spare <WG5339> his own <WG2398> Son, <WG5207> but <WG235> delivered <WG3860> him <WG846> up <WG3860> for <WG5228> us <WG2257> all, <WG3956> how <WG4459> would he <WG5483> not <WG3780> also <WG2532> with <WG4862> him <WG846> freely give <WG5483> us <WG2254> all things? <WG3956>
Who <WG5101> could bring a charge <WG1458> against <WG1588> God <WG2316>'s chosen <WG1588> ones? <WG2316> It is God who justifies. <WG1344>
Who is he who condemns? It is Christ who died, yes rather, who was raised from the dead, who is at the right hand of God, who also makes intercession for us.

Who <WG5101> shall separate <WG5563> us <WG2248> from <WG575> the love <WG26> of Christ? <WG5547> Could oppression, <WG2347> or <WG2228> anguish, <WG4730> or <WG2228> persecution, <WG1375> or <WG2228> famine, <WG3042> or <WG2228> nakedness, <WG1132> or <WG2228> peril, <WG2794> or <WG2228> sword? <WG3162>

Even as <WG2531> it is written, <WG1125> "For <WG3754> your <WG4675> sake <WG1752> we are killed <WG2289> all <WG3650> day long. <WG2250> We were accounted <WG3049> as <WG5613> sheep <WG4263> for the slaughter. <WG4967>"
No, <WG235> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> these things, <WG5125> we are more than conquerors <WG5245> through <WG1223> him who loved <WG25> us. <WG2248>

For <WG1063> I am persuaded, <WG3982> that <WG3754> neither <WG3777> death, <WG2288> nor <WG3777> life, <WG2222> nor <WG3777> angels, <WG32> nor <WG3777> principalities, <WG746> nor <WG3777> things present, <WG1764> nor <WG3777> things to come, <WG3195> nor <WG3777> powers, <WG1411>

nor <WG3777> height, <WG5313> nor <WG3777> depth, <WG899> nor <WG3777> any <WG5100> other <WG2087> created <WG2937> thing, <WG1410> will be able to separate <WG5563> us <WG2248> from <WG575> the love <WG26> of God, <WG2316> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>
